content.rendered:
• 6+ years of experience as a Pre Sales, business analyst/ pre-sales, solution consultant for web and mobile IT products.
  • Experience in Pre Sales is mandatory for this role. An ability to judge clients at the pre-sales stage would be desired for this role.
  • Strong analytical and product requirement management skills including a thorough understanding of how to interpret customer business needs and translate them into the application and operational requirements.
  • Strong interpersonal communication to communicate seamlessly with the clients
  • Ability to interact professionally with a diverse group acting as a liaison between technology teams, support teams and business units.
  • Excellent documentation, verbal & written communication, and team collaboration skills.
